name: TRIORI - lost & never found
description:
“I have everything in my bag including the black hole. Things seem to be lost as soon as I need it.” Lost and never found is a casual game where you play your way trying to retrieve your stuff from the mystery of your bag. You rummage until you find it! (Or never..)

Developers

  • BrBritz
  • VrTech

Artists

  • Chaearn
